NewsItem.HEADLINE: IoT 2018 Expert Insight 2
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This Expert INSIGHT provides clear guidance on the ROI for mobile operators to deploy URLLC (ultra reliable low latency) IoT services and Massive IoT services using 5G NR.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: The status of 3GPP standards is illustrated to show some decisions that are still upcoming and how the choices are likely to come out. Comparisons between NB-IoT and 5G IoT are provided to show where the new 5G format will actually be useful. Also, the impact of network slicing on 5G IoT is analyzed at a business model level.
